name: Free (Josh)
description:
For Tasjam "at home" May 2020

It's a maze, but not one that will make any sense...

For the theme "close but far away", I wanted to create an infinite fractal maze where you could be very close to the goal, yet unable to find it because the world's geometry is all wrong.

I took this jam very relaxed so I basically did half of this in the last 3 hours, and fought Godot most of the way, because I don't know it very well. I think I know it a little bit better now.
